title_zh: W52 挑戰 · 研究摘要

turns.en: Can you summarize the research findings?
Sure. We tested longer dialogues for beginners.
turns.zh: 可以。我們測試初學者的長對話。

turns.en: Speaking time increased by 40% without lower completion.
turns.zh: 口說時間增加 40%，完成率沒有下降。

turns.en: Why do you think that happened?
Short confirmations and structured turns reduced ___
turns.zh: 短確認句與結構化回合降低壓力___。
turns.hint_en: Short confirmations and structured turns reduced pressure.
turns.hint_zh: 短確認句與結構化回合降低壓力。
turns.answer: Short confirmations and structured turns reduced pressure.

turns.en: Some users felt the topic was repetitive.
turns.zh: 有些人覺得主題有點重複。

turns.en: Keep the template, but diversify scenarios.
turns.zh: 保留模板，但多樣化情境。

turns.en: Rotate themes and add optional challenge prompts.
turns.zh: 輪替主題，並加入可選挑戰提示。

turns.en: Test two cloze turns in higher ___
turns.zh: 在較高等級測試兩個挖空___。
turns.hint_en: Test two cloze turns in higher levels.
turns.hint_zh: 在較高等級測試兩個挖空。
turns.answer: Test two cloze turns in higher levels.

turns.en: Two weeks for the A/B test.
Great. Please write a short report.
